{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-13T13:31:59.000Z", "description": "

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

The engineer\u2019s responsibilities include: understanding requirements and technical specifications of complex enterprise solutions, creation of customer-like lab environments, the design and execution of tests, use and/or development of specialized tools to facilitate testing, working with architects, software/hardware engineers to investigate problem areas, and effective communication of problem areas, solution capabilities and potential customer impacting issues.

#Li-NA1

JOB REQUIREMENT

Required skills sets: (software, hardware, languages, OS, tools, etc.)

BS or MS in Computer Science or a related engineering field. 2+ years experience in system/solution test or system engineering in a communications related field. A strong desire to learn and develop expertise in business communications and test business communications systems end to end, at scale, and in disaster recovery scenarios is essential.

DESIRED skill sets:

Solution testing in one or more of the following areas: Avaya Contact Centers, cloud-based solutions, WebRTC, Servers, networks LAN/WAN, Client/Server architectures, operating systems, web services, unified communications. Effective communication skills, oral and written, and the ability to function in a team environment. Experience with Windows (OS and domain infrastructures), Linux, databases (MSSQL, Oracle, DB2, Informix), virtualization, Web Services and PBXs with ACD capabilities.

EXPERIENCE

7 - 10 Years of Experience

EDUCATION

Bachelor degree or equivalent experience

Advance Degree preferred
